resources.string: Customize the animations of each window in system
This is test for toast animation
Scrolling cache may improve scrolling performance at the cost of memory
%1$s edge of the status bar pulls down Quick Settings
Double-tap on the status bar to turn off the display
Display the number of pending notifications
Control which status bar icons are shown
Display seconds next to clock in status bar
Hide and display clock for regular interval to save statusbar space
Number of seconds to hide clock
Number of seconds to wait before hiding clock
Must be in DateFormat eg. MM/dd/yy
Always display battery percentage when charging
Custom charging symbol for text style
Custom charging symbol near battery percentage text
Adjust brightness from the Quick Settings
Show toggle for adaptive brightness near the slider
Adjust brightness by sliding across the status bar
Display and customize current network traffic levels
Hide the traffic monitor when inactive
Whether to show traffic measurement units
Hide the network traffic indicator arrows
Duration after which speed is remeasured
A half press will keep the screen on only while the button is held down
A longpress and release will launch camera
Seek music tracks by long pressing the volume keys while the display is off
End the current call by pressing the power button
Swap volume buttons when the screen is rotated
Display volume panel on the left side of the screen
Answer incoming calls by pressing the volume buttons
Answer incoming calls by pressing the home button
Enable on-screen navigation bar and disable hardware buttons
Place the navigation bar on the left side of the screen in landscape mode
Display left and right cursor buttons while typing. Overrides IME switcher.
Bug reporting is disabled in development settings
Press power button twice for camera
Quickly open camera without unlocking your screen
Activate the torch by long pressing the power button while the display is off
When unlocked, include options in the power menu for restarting into recovery or bootloader
Display advanced restart options on secured lockscreen
Display negociated charger max current and voltage and battery temperature on lockscreen while charging
Display an animation when the device is plugged in
Screen overlay showing current CPU info
The charging animation may result in a poor user experience. Enable at your own discretion.
Use gradient color as a scale for the battery level
Blend full/empty colors corresponding to battery percentage
Full → empty: red ← green ← blue ← red
Full → empty: red → green → blue → red
Display icon of activity that generates toast message
Logo, Volte Icon, Weather Icon, 4g Icon\n Data Indicator, Bluetooth Indicator
Display the cross sign next to signal icon when data is disabled
Display roaming indicator in signal icon when in roaming mode
Display 4G icon in signal icon instead LTE
Show toggle for adaptive brightness near the slider
Show a brightness slider in the quick settings panel
Display clock in quick status bar header
Swipe three fingers to take screenshot
Control the blur amount of media artwork
Unlock device with fingerprint after reboot or lockdown
Set custom volume steps for sounds
Show a dialog when an application crashes
Save battery by shutting off extra pixels
Enable with battery saver to increase power savings
Enter device idle more frequently and wake up less
Restrict apps from running in the background
Enable Aggressive Battery automatically when using battery saver
Disable heads up in these applications
Disable heads up for these applications
Configure shortcuts on bottom of the screen
Display battery status for the connected bluetooth device, if available
Display estimated remaining battery life when available
Double-tap anywhere on the lockscreen to put device asleep
Animate smooth lava lamp style color blend
Shows the visualization bars also on ambient display (but less opaque)
Will give your sms notifications a breathing effect in the status bar
Will give your missed call notifications a breathing effect in the statusbar
Will give your voicemail notifications a breathing effect in the statusbar
Allow accessing power menu on secure lock screen
Blocking wakelocks have the potential to cause instability, crashes or data loss
Blocking alarms have the potential to cause instability, crashes or data loss.
Enable to display logo in the status bar
Choose which side to display the logo on, left or right
Active volume stream will be displayed on the screen even if disabled here. Volume streams enabled here would be displayed forcefully.
Peeking notifications will show for %d seconds
Swiping up on peeking notifications will snooze heads up from that application for 1 minute
Swiping up on peeking notifications will snooze heads up from that application for %d minutes
Show heads up only for dialer, messaging and alarm app
Toggles status bar visibility on lock screen
Show a kill app button in the notification\'s longpress menu
Automatically turn on for these apps
Gaming mode will turn on automatically when these apps are opened and turn off when they are closed
When Gaming mode is turned on, buttons will be locked
Lock screen brightness when Gaming mode is turned on
Try detecting and adding gaming apps automatically
Block notifications sound & vibration when Gaming mode is turned on
Enable notification panel header weather display
Note\u003a you can install new icon packs from play store by searching for \"Chronus icons\"
Condition icon is shown on Lockscreen
Condition icon is hidden on Lockscreen
Show name of current city on left of image
Show current city temperature on right of image
Disable to block notifications sound and vibration when the screen is awake
For better visibility on bright images
Select a local or remote image
Enter a custom label. Leave blank to use your network name
Show mobile type icon on top of the signal indicator
Show edge lighting on new notification
Sets the ambient light animation duration
Show edge lighting on AoD on new notification
Hide other AoD content while edge lighting is shown
Follow system accent color instead of the user defined edge light color
Wake screen on receiving new notifications must be turned on
Pulses for all doze events and not just for notifications
Set max repeat count. 0 for infinite
Prevent apps from appearing in recents
Show buttons beside the brightness slider to adjust brightness
Pulse flash when there\'s a call waiting
Toggle to enable setting max notifications count on lockscreen
Control the maximum number of expanded notifications to show on lockscreen
Force apps that support expanded notifications
Block access to certain sensors for some apps to save battery
Allow apps to bypass security systems by pretending to be a different app.
Show temp with scale and image
Show temp with image without scale
Display Settings icon in quick settings footer
Display Running Services icon in quick settings footer
Display Multi-user switcher icon in quick settings footer
Display the tile edit icon in quick settings footer
Toogle to show custom text on qs footer
Display lock icon on the lockscreen
Replace clear all text with nice button
Show clear all notifications button in quick settings instead of default text one
Hide smart replies to save screen space with peeking notifications

Set QS background color from Wallpaper
Disable custom QS styles for external theme engines

Enable the new QS tint style

blurs darkened background behind quick settings

Icons/colors may vary depending on which device you are using.
Launch music app on headset connection
Launch the default music app when headset is connected
Enable to Hide Date Widget and other items
When using Typeclock clock style use sizes ranging from 20 to 60, beyond 60 is too large for typeclock
To check time, notifications, and other info, reach for your phone
To use this feature, turn on Motion Sense
With new sensors, Pixel can recognize distance and movement around the phone
Motion Sense features like Quick Gestures, show display when nearby, and reach to check phone are not supported in this country
Motion Sense features like Quick Gestures, show display when nearby, and reach to check phone are supported in this country
Show time, notification icons, and other info when you’re nearby
Unavailable because always-on display is off
If you turn off Motion Sense, you can’t use Quick Gestures, show display when nearby, and reach to check phone
Quick Gestures and other Motion Sense features are not supported in this country.
To use Quick Gestures, turn on Motion Sense.
On / Snooze alarms and silence calls
Swipe left to right for next song
Swipe right to left for next song
On / Skip to the next or previous song
Skip to the next or previous song
Reach to check phone and other Motion Sense features are not supported in this country
To use Reach to check phone, turn on Motion Sense
Reach to check phone is off
Trigger an action when the screen is off
Not all squeeze actions within Active Edge have the capability to activate the display
